attributes.action: Make the banks transfer funds between accounts without delay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a cheque or card payment is made there is a delay of 3 working days to transfer the money from one account to another. If the funds were to be transfered without delay then a lot of small business would have less need to borrow. Also wages would appear in the workers account immediatly so that bills could be paid promptly.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
